name: Sergeant Irol (V)
Lore: 'Cocky stormtrooper from an Outer Rim forest planet. Confident biker scout and hunter. Relies on superior balance and strength to operate his speeder bike.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. (3 if a speeder bike.) Once per turn, while piloting at a battleground site, may lose 1 Force to cancel a Force drain at opponent''s interior site.',
